member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_THREADING
member.summary: Describes the multi-threading features that are supported by the current graphics driver.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_THREADING.DriverConcurrentCreates
member.summary: TRUE means resources can be created concurrently on multiple threads while drawing; FALSE means that the presence of coarse synchronization will prevent concurrency.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_THREADING.DriverCommandLists
member.summary: TRUE means command lists are supported by the current driver; FALSE means that the API will emulate deferred contexts and command lists with software.
